elementSpec.desc: contains information about a person's birth, such as its date and place.

attDef.desc: specifies the date of birth in an ISO standard form (yyyy-mm-dd).
attDef.valDesc: a date in ISO standard form, generally ISO 8601:2000 5.2.1.1 Complete representation, extended format (yyyy-mm-dd).

egXML.birth: In a small cottage near Aix-la-Chapelle, early in the morning of 10 Dec 1960

remarks.p: Dates and place names, if included in the content of this element, should in general be tagged using the date and name elements respectively. If the additional tagset for Names and Dates is in use, the more specific elements defined by that tagset may be used as an alternative.
